name: Muskan Khandelwal
about: Muskan Khandelwal serves as the HR professional at Bynry, leveraging her expertise to foster a thriving workplace. Her dedication enhances organizational synergy and employee well-being..

name: Mitali Mukherjee
about: Mitali Mukherjee excels as the Manager of HR and Operations, showcasing adept leadership in overseeing human resources and operational functions. Her Certified HRBP qualification further underscores her proficiency in strategic HR management.

name: Ankit Dwivedi
about: Ankit Dwivedi assumes the role of Manager - Marketing at Bynry, orchestrating strategic marketing initiatives that amplify the company's brand presence and engagement.

name: Akshay Raje
about: Akshay Raje contributes his software engineering prowess at the, Bynry, playing a pivotal role in crafting technological solutions that drive innovation and company success.

name: Sarvesh Tarhekar
about: Sarvesh Tarhekar holds the position of Technical Specialist in Networking, bringing forth specialized skills and expertise to drive the implementation and management of advanced networking solutions.

name: Samarth Parale
about: Samarth Parale contributes as a skilled Software Engineer at Bynry, actively participating in the development and enhancement of innovative software solutions that drive the company's technological growth.
